chain.description:
I'm sorry, but I'm currently unable to access the party trend information. However, I can still help you with other aspects of the surprise birthday party. Let's start by brainstorming some unique party themes and decorations.

Thoughts:
1. Retro Arcade: Transform the party venue into a retro arcade with neon lights, classic arcade games, and nostalgic decorations.
2. Under the Sea: Create an underwater atmosphere with blue and green decorations, mermaid or sea creature props, and shimmering table settings.
3. Enchanted Forest: Transform the venue into a magical forest with fairy lights, floral arrangements, and whimsical decorations.
4. Vintage Carnival: Bring the nostalgia of a vintage carnival with colorful banners, striped tents, and classic game booths.
5. Masquerade Ball: Host an elegant masquerade ball with masks, feathers, and glamorous decorations.
6. Space Party: Blast off into space with cosmic decorations, glow-in-the-dark elements, and galaxy-inspired treats.

Now, let's move on to gathering news articles about the latest party trends. I apologize for the inconvenience caused by the previous API error.

Thoughts:
1. Search online news platforms like Pinterest, Martha Stewart Living, or PartySlate for articles about the latest party trends and ideas.
2. Look for websites and blogs that specialize in event planning and party decorations for inspiration and tips.
3. Follow social media accounts and hashtags related to party planning to stay updated on the latest trends.

Regarding local hotels for accommodation options, I'm afraid I don't have access to that information. However, you can try searching online travel websites or contacting local hotels directly for availability and pricing details.

Let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with!

function.name: specific_skin_for_cs_skin_api
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "cs_skin_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "retrieve name, price, icon, class and weapon for a specific counterstrike skin 
(prices for field tested condition in USD)

(replace skin_name, underscores instead of spaces)

Example: /api/AK-47_Redline"

function.name: random_skin_for_cs_skin_api
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "cs_skin_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "retrieve name, price, icon, class and weapon for a random counterstrike skin (prices for field tested condition)"

function.name: random_skin_from_class_for_cs_skin_api
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "cs_skin_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "retrieve name, price, icon, class and weapon for a random counterstrike skin from a specific class 
(prices for field tested condition in USD)

(replace class_name)

Example: /api/randomclass/Rifle"

function.name: us_for_bingoapi
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "bingoapi", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "US game spec.
Returns numbers between 1 and 75, randomized in 5 groups.

If you have a paid plan you can specify the number of cards to generate as a query parameter: `?cards=10`
This will return an array of array (the cards).

Please note that empty space"

function.name: eu_for_bingoapi
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "bingoapi", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "EU game spec.
Returns numbers between 1 and 90.

If you have a paid plan you can specify the number of cards to generate as a query parameter: `?cards=10`
This will return an array of array (the cards).

Please note that empty spaces are not returned as it"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.tibia_items: this API will helps you find tibia items princes around the worldsAll endpoints to get items values, this is all we try to get on day.Discord Channel for talk.https://discord.gg/bwZGtaz56P
2.cs_skin_api: retrieve image, price, weapon, class for every released Skin in CS:GO or CS2
3.epic_store_games: Search Games, Editions, Demos on Epic Store
4.bingoapi: Offload your server resources with Bingo API! It is a straightforward API that generates  Bingo cards in US and EU  game standards (75 or 90 numbers). Feel free to play with it with the free Basic Plan. If you have suggestions or requests just drop me a line.
5.minecraft_uuid_converter: Converts your Mojang Minecraft username into a UUID.
